title: Earth-616
description: The primary continuity of the Marvel Universe where most heroes like Iron Man and Captain America exist.

title: Earth-199999
description: Also known as the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), home to Avengers and Guardians of the Galaxy.

title: Multiverse
description: A vast web of alternate universes where different versions of Marvel characters exist.

title: Quantum Realm
description: A mysterious dimension accessed through quantum technology, explored in Ant-Man series.

title: Asgard
description: The mythical realm ruled by Odin, and home to Thor and Loki.

title: Wakanda
description: A technologically advanced African nation, protected by the Black Panther.

title: Dark Dimension
description: A chaotic realm ruled by Dormammu, explored in Doctor Strange.

title: Sakaar
description: A garbage planet ruled by the Grandmaster where Hulk became a gladiator.

title: Titan
description: The homeworld of Thanos, now a destroyed wasteland.

title: Knowhere
description: A remote outpost built inside the skull of a Celestial, often visited by the Guardians.
